African dream

Tuesday, Dec 15, 2020

My dream, my mission, my creed is the African dream. A vision of a thriving Africa. An Africa where survival is not paramount, where the youth can dream and fulfill their dreams within the continent. Africa's population keeps growing, and its issues with it.
